block: Malignant neoplasms of mesothelial and soft tissue
category: Malignant neoplasm of other connective and soft tissue
title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of connective and soft tissue
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C47-C49.6
exclusion: peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system
